lead_paragraph: Pyongyang said the United States should stop pressuring it over human rights, calling the defector’s reversal evidence that a United Nations report on its rights record was false.
snippet: Pyongyang said the United States should stop pressuring it over human rights, calling the defector’s reversal evidence that a United Nations report on its rights record was false.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: North Korea Uses Defector’s Partial Retraction to Lash Out at Washington
